content: पार्वत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पर्वते भवः अण्] {@--1@} Being or living on a mountain. {@--2@} Growing on or coming from a mountain. {@--3@} Mountainous.

पार्वती [पर्वतस्यापत्यं स्त्री अण्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā, born as the daughter of the Himālaya mountain (she was Satī in her former birth; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls>); तां पार्वतीत्याभिजनेन नाम्ना बंधुप्रियां बंधुजनो जुहाव <ls>Ku. 1. 26.</ls> {@--2@} A female cowherd. {@--3@} An epithet of Draupadī. {@--4@} A mountain stream. {@--5@} A kind of fragrant earth.
